problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that the area of ​​△ABC is N_0, the point D is on the line segment AC, the point F is on the extended line of the line segment BC, and BC = N_1 CF, the quadrilateral DCFE is a parallelogram, then the area of ​​the shaded part in the figure is ( )
raw_answer: 解:连接AF、EC．∵BC=4CF,S~△ABC~=12,∴S~△ACF~=\frac{1}{4}×12=3,∵四边形CDEF是平行四边形,∴DE∥CF,EF∥AC,∴S~△DEB~=S~△DEC~,∴S~阴~=S~△ADE~+S~△DEC~=S~△AEC~,∵EF∥AC,∴S~△AEC~=S~△ACF~=3,∴S~阴~=3．故选:B．
